/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. 

On the right side of the street, a white car is parked, its presence adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise natural landscape. On the left side, a person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, perhaps enjoying a leisurely stroll under the sun. 

The image is taken from a low angle, giving a unique perspective to the viewer. It's as if we're standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the expansive sky. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
